mapper.select: SELECT hSerial, hEmail, hName, hContent, hType, hAddress, hPrice, ROUND( (SELECT (( SUM(c.cClean) + SUM(c.cService) + SUM(c.cLocation) )/3)/COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS c WHERE c.cPserial = h.hSerial GROUP BY c.cPserial) , 1 ) grade FROM HOUSE h ORDER BY grade DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT hSerial, hEmail, hName, hContent, hType, hAddress, hPrice, ROUND( (SELECT (( SUM(c.cClean) + SUM(c.cService) + SUM(c.cLocation) )/3)/COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS c WHERE c.cPserial = h.hSerial GROUP BY c.cPserial) , 1 ) grade FROM HOUSE h JOIN DETAILS d ON h.hSerial = d.dPserial WHERE h.hType like '%${hType}%' and d.dPeople >= ${dPeople} and h.hPrice <= ${hPrice} and d.dBedroom >= ${dBedroom} and d.dBed >= ${dBed} and d.dBathroom >= ${dBathroom} and d.dKitchen like '%${dKitchen}%' and d.dAc like '%${dAc}%' and d.dWifi like '%${dWifi}%' and d.dTv like '%${dTv}%' and d.dWasher like '%${dWasher}%' and d.dParking like '%${dParking}%' and d.dAmenity like '%${dAmenity}%' and d.dHdrier like '%${dHdrier}%' and d.dSelfcheckin like '%${dSelfcheckin}%' and (h.hEmail like '%${findStr}%' or h.hName like '%${findStr}%' or h.hAddress like '%${findStr}%') ORDER BY grade DESC NULLS LAST
select fPhoto from hFiles where fPserial = #{_parameter}
SELECT mIntroduce, mPhoto, mName, mBirthday FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMAIL = #{_parameter}
